title: Disaster Recovery Requirement
description: Ensure that the system conforms to core disaster recovery requirements as part of the resiliency portfolio.

description.const: The system must conform to core disaster recovery requirements.

scope-text.const: All critical trading systems must comply.

site-redundancy.description: The minimum number of sites an instance of this architecture needs to be deployed to.

evidence-type.description: Type of evidence required to demonstrate compliance.
